INSERT INTO apply (application_seq, id, name, place_seq, sub_category_seq, genre_seq, age_limit, start_date, end_date, running_time, running_intertime, open_date, status, created_at, updated_at, max_ticket, away_team_seq) VALUES (#{application_seq}, #{id}, #{name}, #{place_seq}, #{sub_category_seq}, #{genre_seq}, #{age_limit}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{running_time}, #{running_intertime}, #{open_date}, '승인 대기', sysdate, null, #{max_ticket}, #{away_team_seq})

insert into schedule (schedule_seq, application_seq, schedule_day, schedule_time) values (schedule_seq.nextval, #{application_seq}, TO_DATE(#{schedule_day}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{schedule_time}, 'HH24:MI:SS'))

insert into casting (casting_seq, application_seq, casting_name, casting_role, schedule_day, schedule_time, file_oriname, file_sysname) values (casting_seq.nextval, #{application_seq}, #{casting_name},#{casting_role},#{schedule_day}, TO_DATE(#{schedule_time}, 'HH24:MI:SS'), #{file_oriname}, #{file_sysname})

INSERT INTO files (files_seq, files_oriname, files_sysname, files_type, files_from, files_parent_seq) VALUES (files_seq.nextval, #{files_oriname}, #{files_sysname}, 'poster','event', #{files_parent_seq})
INSERT INTO description (description_seq, application_seq, description_content) VALUES (description_seq.nextval, #{application_seq}, #{detailed_description})
